document.full_text: ending a three-day visit to myanmar, senator john mccain warned the country's leaders that 'the winds of change' now blowing in the middle east could spread.
document.title: asia: ending myanmar visit, mccain urges democratic reform
lines_and_colors: ending a three-day visit to myanmar, senator john mccain warned the country's leaders that 'the winds of change' now blowing in the middle east could spread.
